amendment.description: An amendment numbered 127 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds from being used to implement any of the Administration's executive orders on climate change.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from being used to implement any of the Administration's executive orders on climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A077) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 207 (Roll no. 595).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A077) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 207 (Roll no. 595).
